title: Leading hair conditioner brands in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars 133.7 is found at Brand Organix and the minimum is found at L'Oréal EverPure where Brand is 29.0.
The difference of Sales in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 104.7.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Organix and lowest at Brand L'Oréal EverPure.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars 133.7 is found at Brand Organix and the minimum is found at L'Oréal EverPure where Brand is 29.0.
The lowest value at Brand L'Oréal EverPure is 4.61x times less than the highest value at Organix.
The Brand Organix has the highest Sales in million U.S. dollars, followed by Shea Moisture, and Garnier Whole Blends. Down to the Brand L'Oréal EverPure which is the lowest.
The average Sales in million U.S. dollars in all 10 Brands is 55.87.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is 558.7 if we add up values of all Brands.
